name: Pumpkin Thief
description:
Run through the neighborhood and eat all 10 pumpkins to win! 🎃

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys = MovementE = Chomp Pumpkins
Escape = Exit fullscreen
Game may take a second to load at first, recommend giving the game a download for the best experience!🐿️

Art and Concept by: Isaac La Russa

Programming and Art Assistance: Hadley Richardson-O'Brien

Music: Nicholas Newman

Dog Sounds: Sierra the Dog

Made for Great Autumn Game Jam 2021!
